items.title: Wegovy pill now available at pharmacies
items.description: The Wegovy pill approved in December arrived at pharmacies nationwide on Monday. Patients now have a new way to take the weight loss medication.

items.title: More seniors are becoming homeless. Shelters are trying to adapt
items.description: Older adults are the fastest-growing homeless population across the U.S. Now some shelters are trying to make it easier to accommodate older people.

items.title: Older Americans Quit Weight-Loss Drugs in Droves
items.description: In some studies, half of patients stopped taking GLP-1s within a year despite the benefits, citing the expense and side effects.
